SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT350
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
It is used to inform that an interest amount has been paid to the account of the beneficiary with the receiving agent mentioned in the message.
The message may also be used to notify the details of:
a) an amendment to a previously sent advice
b) the cancellation of an advice.
This message is sent by or on behalf of the institution or corporate, party A who has borrowed cash from the institution or corporate, party B.
Party A and party B are the legal entities which have agreed to the transaction.
Party A is either:
a) the Sender, or
b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is sent
Party B is either:
a) the Receiver, or
b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is received

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: ADVC
Code.Description: New advice. Used to send the MT 350 for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 350 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 350 with function CANC.

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 350 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 350 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 350 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 350 which contains erroneous information.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral advice, ie, Sender and Receiver are the principals.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Start Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
End Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36) :
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information on BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations. (Error code(s): C05) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In sequence A, if field 22A contains ADVC then field 21 is optional, otherwise field 21 is mandatory (Error code(s): D02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 22A contains ADVC then field 21 is optional, otherwise field 21 is mandatory."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In sequence A, if field 94A is present and contains AGNT, then field 21N in sequence A is mandatory, otherwise field 21N is optional (Error code(s): D72).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 94A is present and contains AGNT, then field 21N in sequence A is mandatory, otherwise field 21N is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 In sequence C, if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in sequence C is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C, if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in sequence C is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 The currency code in the amount fields 32B and 34B in Sequence B must be the same (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in the amount fields 32B and 34B in Sequence B must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 If Sequence D is present, at least one of the subsequences D1 or D2 must be present (Error code(s): E47).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Sequence D is present, at least one of the subsequences D1 or D2 must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-A This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 350. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)(Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 350. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-B Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 37J in sequence B, preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 37J in sequence B, preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-72 The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"
